name: Moonlight Fencing
description:
Made for the Bean Jam 3 in three hours from scratch.

The theme was "Darkness".

Controls:

Adefend high
S
defend middle
Ddefend low
Qattack high
Wattack middleEattack low

"You look week Sir Bleu, I wager ten smites will be your demise!"
"But so do you Monseur Rouge! You barely know how to hold this weapon!"
"ENGARDE!"
